Member Function Documentation

void Sequence::getReward ( Vector &  rewards  )  [virtual]

Just return the reward associated with the most recent state achieved.

Parameters:
vector of rewards. The vector has getAgents() dimensionality In non-local reward mode this vector will just be averaged.

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 27 of file Sequence.cc.

void Sequence::getObservation ( Observation &  obs  )  [virtual]

Return the observation of the current state. Could be a scalar, vector, or matrix, so we left the type as Matrix

Returns:
possibly stochastic observation of the current state

Implements libpg::Simulator.

int Sequence::doAction ( Vector &  action  )  [virtual]

Do action issued by a controller

Returns:
vector of actions, typically just a scalar which is cast to an int, but it there are multiple agents it will be a vector of actions for each agent.
Parameters:
vector that describes the action to perform.

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 46 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getMaxEpisodeLength (  )  [virtual]

Maximum episode length in steps. For planning mode. Only used by GOALPomdp at the moment.

Reimplemented from libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 56 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getObsRows (  )  [virtual]

Get the number of rows in observation matrix. Generally the length of the observation vector.

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 62 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getObsCols (  )  [virtual]

Get the number of columns in the observation matrix Typically use multiple columns to provide a different observation to each agent, so the number of columns is the same as getAgents()

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 69 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getAgents (  )  [virtual]

Get the total number of agents. Usually 1.

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 74 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getActionDim (  )  [virtual]

Get the total action dimensionality. Often, but not necessarily, the same as the number of agents.

Implements libpg::Simulator.

Definition at line 80 of file Sequence.cc.

int Sequence::getRewardDim (  )  [virtual]

Get the dimensionality of the reward vector. Often, but not necessarily, the same as the number of agents.

Implements libpg::Simulator.
